title: br88
author: br88
content: Hello,I'm domain seller but this time I couldn't make a single sale and I'm broke.I've $90 balance in NameCheap.com which are good to purchase domains and hosting.But I need a fast cash, So I will purchase a domain from you for $60 on NameCheap if you can send $23 to me in Bitcoins.After $6 commission, You will have $54 on NameCheap. But since the $24 ($23 bitcoin + $1 domain) is your investment, Your profit is $30.You can use Paxful if you only have PayPal to send bitcoins to me.Let's do it. Only for trusted members. We will do the transaction in two steps either.I'm grateful.[ FYI: There's an internet shutdown in my state, That's why I couldn't make a sale and wasted my money in the process to move to another state. https://www.zawya.com/en/economy/africa/ethiopia-internet-shutdown-in-amhara-region-as-clashes-surge-kbpyllre ] [ I'm not begging anyhow, I'm just telling my story so you guys could be able to do the deal with full information. Thank you very much. ]

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Only works with new domain purchases?Can you transfer the balance to another account, somehow? Or renew someone’s domain? I got a domain I could add a few years to (if possible).

I got a domain I could add a few years to (if possible).I will free push a domain for you at first  and you will give it a price and I will purchase it. and you can do whatever you wanna do with the funds in NameCheap. $54!

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.created_time: September 09, 2023, 07:13:33 PMLast edit: September 14, 2023, 07:04:16 PM by TryNinja
comments.body: Update:I see the $54, but namecheap says the funds will clear in 5 days (seems normal for marketplace deals). I sent OP the $23 and will update when/if the funds show up as available on my balance.edit: got the funds, thanks OP
